thread.title: BRIEF-‍Brigade Strongly Supports Glass Lewis Recommendation To Vote Against Kindred Healthcare Merger​

title: BRIEF-‍Brigade Strongly Supports Glass Lewis Recommendation To Vote Against Kindred Healthcare Merger​

organizations.name: vote against kindred healthcare merger​ reuters

text: March 21, 2018 / 11:52 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago BRIEF-‍Brigade Strongly Supports Glass Lewis Recommendation To Vote Against Kindred Healthcare Merger​ Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Kindred Healthcare Inc: * ‍BRIGADE STRONGLY SUPPORTS GLASS LEWIS RECOMMENDATION TO VOTE AGAINST KINDRED HEALTHCARE MERGER​ * ‍BRIGADE CAPITAL - STRONGLY SUPPORTS RECOMMENDATION BY GLASS LEWIS TO VOTE AGAINST KINDRED HEALTHCARE’S 2018 MERGER-RELATED PROXY PROPOSALS​ * BRIGADE CAPITAL SAYS ‍BRIGADE INTENDS TO VOTE AGAINST PROPOSED TRANSACTION AND URGES ALL KINDRED SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE AGAINST PROPOSED TRANSACTION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
